mapper.select: SELECT date(purchase_time) AS label, sum(total) AS data FROM orders WHERE date_part('year', purchase_time) = #{year} and date_part('month', purchase_time) = #{month} GROUP BY label ORDER BY label ASC

SELECT co.name as mname, date_part('day', o.purchase_time) AS mdate, count(co.name) AS mcup FROM orders as o, cups as c, coffees as co WHERE c.orders_id = o.orders_id and c.coffees_id = co.coffees_id and date_part('year', o.purchase_time) = #{year} and date_part('month', o.purchase_time) = #{month} GROUP BY mname, mdate ORDER BY mname, mdate
SELECT date_part('year', purchase_time) as myear FROM orders GROUP BY myear ORDER BY myear DESC
SELECT date_part('month', purchase_time)AS mmonth FROM orders WHERE date_part('year', purchase_time) = #{year} GROUP BY mmonth ORDER BY mmonth ASC
SELECT count(co.name) FROM cups as c, coffees as co, orders as o WHERE c.coffees_id=co.coffees_id and c.orders_id = o.orders_id and co.name = #{coffeeName} and date(o.purchase_time) = #{date}
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE purchase_time > #{dfrom} and purchase_time < #{dto}
